content: **crochet drops jumper with fringe in tynn cotton chenille and shoulder warmer with hood in pelliza ** see the lady lockskley shoulder warmer pattern here 1 drops design pattern no h-035+j-022 -------------------------------------------------------- ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **jumper** sizes s/m - m/l xl finished measurements bust 98-106-112 cm / 38⅝ - 41¾ - 44 hem 112-120-128 cm / 44 - 47¼ - 50⅜ materials drops tynn chenille 90% cotton 10% polyester 50 g/120 m /130 yards 550-600-650 g col no 926 burgundy drops 4 mm / us g crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/66-20-b-lady-locksley-shoulder-warmer
